title: Yen Jumps Most Since August as Risk of Intervention Ramps Up
description: The yen abruptly staged its biggest one-day surge since August on speculation that Japanese authorities could be preparing to mount a market intervention to halt the currency’s slide.
content: The yen abruptly staged its biggest one-day surge since August on speculation that Japanese authorities could be preparing to mount a market intervention to halt the currency’s slide.
